text:

text: happy to see this game on here. shadow hearts was my first ps 2 rpg, covenant my favorite.
author: DatLine

text:
my fav jrpg series(well, I personally don't count the third).
I wont' spoiler that for anyone, but anyone who has played it knows what i'm talking about...THAT moment in covenant made me cried so damn much. The ending, too. great characters, storyline, music...everything feels great in this game. the only flaw of the first one was the outdated graphics, wich is SPLENDID in the sequel.

text:

The real sad thing however is that I was completely lost and totally forgot how to play the game, or where to even start with ;_;

text: I've beaten SH1+2, I preferred 1 despite 2 having improvements in graphics and combat. I also liked the cast like yourself. Never played 3, heard it wasn't as good.
author: Seigfreid

text: I've always wanted to play this game.  I played the first Shadow Hearts and I absolutely loved it.  From what I've heard, this game only improved upon the first.
author: Aberix

text:
I have Covenant, but I won't play it until I can play Shadow Hearts. Problem is they're both rather hard to find in person. I actually got Shadow Hearts Covenant by having my Gamestop ship it from  across the country(U.S). Waited 3 weeks. I'll say it's gonna be worth it even if I ultimately shipping, game, and tax had to pay around $90 to get it.
I make this a response comment because frankly I never would've discovered this series(or many others)without this channel. Thank you.

author: Taislinmaosdela

text: This is actually like my favourite PS2 RPG and I played it entirely by chance. I enjoyed the third game just fine (even if not quite close to as good), and finally went back to the first game too, not too long ago actually. It really pains me to see the developer essentially vanish, I know they were like sold into Mistwalker or something at some point, or at least helped with Lost Odyssey, but I feel the systems were an imitation at best.
author: MrStruggle

text:
i love how you comment on every VGM you upload.
love your channel
author: drkill999

text: Man, I sure missed out on a lot of stellar RPG's being born as late as I was. Thanks for educating me on titles I would otherwise never hear of Supra.
author: Maxadude

text: It's a very underlooked game, unfortunately. If you're interested in playing it, I really recommend playing its direct prequel first, some of the major plot points will make a lot more sense. Just watching this game's opening on YouTube makes me realize how much I miss this series.
author: SupraDarky

text: Yuri's my favorite protagonist in a jRPG (an anti-hero done right), the game has an outstanding roster of memorable characters, the soundtrack is composed by 3 awesome composers (Hirota, Mitsuda and Ito), the battle system is engaging, the story is a perfect blend of mature, horror and humor that actually works, it takes place on Earth in a unique way in the early 20th century, blood pumping cutscenes and a great variety of intelligent villains. This is why SH: Covenant is one my favorites ever.
author: SupraDarky
